name: Terraformer
description: Have a terraform rating of 35 (or 26 with Turmoil.)

name: Generalist
description: Have increased all 6 productions by 1 step

name: Specialist
description: Have 10 in production of any resource

name: Ecologist
description: Have 4 bio tags (plant, microbe and animal tags count as bio tags)

name: Tycoon
description: Have 15 project cards (blue and green cards)

name: Polar Explorer
description: Own 3 tiles on the two bottom rows

name: Hoverlord
description: Have 7 floater resources on your cards

name: Networker
description: Have placed 3 tiles adjacent to tiles that grant adjacency bonuses

name: Minimalist
description: Have no more than 2 cards in hand

name: Tropicalist
description: Own 3 tiles in the middle 3 equatorial rows

name: Collector
description: Have 3 sets of automated, active and event cards

name: Smith
description: Have a total of 7 steel and titanium production

name: Tradesman
description: Have 3 different types of non-standard resources

name: Thermalist
description: Have the most heat (after final production round)

name: Miner
description: Have the most steel and titanium (after final production round)

name: Celebrity
description: Play the most cards with a base cost of at least 20 M€ (not events.)

name: Industrialist
description: Have most steel and energy (after final production round)

name: Desert Settler
description: Own the most tiles south of the equator (the four bottom rows)

name: Estate Dealer
description: Own the most tiles adjacent to ocean tiles

name: Magnate
description: Play the most automated cards (green cards)

name: Excentric
description: Have the most resources on cards

name: Entrepreneur
description: Own the most tiles that grant adjacency bonuses

name: Lunar Magnate
description: Own the most tiles on The Moon

name: Curator
description: Have the most tags of any one type

name: Engineer
description: Play the most cards that directly alter your own production

name: Tourist
description: Have the most empty spaces adjacent to your tiles

name: A. Zoologist
description: Own the most animal and microbe resources

name: Cosmic Settler
description: Own the most cities not on Mars

name: Biologist
description: Have the most bio tags (animal, plant, and microbe tags count as bio tags.)

name: T. Economizer
description: Play the most cards with a base cost of 10 M€ or less (not events.)

name: Urbanist
description: Have the most VP from city tile adjacencies on Mars

name: Warmonger
description: Play the most cards that reduce other players' resources or production

name: Adapter
description: Play the most cards with requirements

name: Edgedancer
description: Own the most tiles on the edges of the board

name: Hoarder
description: Have the most cards in hand

name: Naturalist
description: Have the most plant and heat production
